modName: Crimson Twilight Armor All Retextures Craftable
summary:
This is a set of modified esp files of Crimson Twilight Armor. It makes all retextures of armor craftable and usable at the same time.
Has versions for light and heavy armor.
Has normal craft method (as in original) and conversive craft method (which takes less place in forge).
Body support: CBBE & BodySlide,7BUNP,UNP,UNPB,7Base
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Description
==================[/color]
This mod is a modification of original mod made by jmenaru, and it is uploaded with his permission.
It REQUIRES the original mod located here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59399/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59399/?[/url]

This modified esp's makes all retextures of Crimson Twilight Armor standalone, craftable and usable together in game.
Contains versions for heavy and light armor.
Contains two variants of crafting - default and conversive (about conversive craft see description of optional files below).

[color=#93c47d]Retextures included:[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Red[/color] - by jmenaru (original)
[color=#000000]Black[/color] - by jmenaru (original)
[color=#6d9eeb]Blue[/color] - by Yngol1Storm1Blade
[color=#93c47d]Green[/color] - by cald123
[color=#9900ff]Purple[/color] - by cald123
[color=#bf9000]Woodland[/color] - by cald123
[color=#ffe599]Yellow[/color] - by cinek12345
White - by ScorpionSK
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60389/?]Al-Dahna[/url] - by betterbecause [color=#ff00ff](NEW in v1.2!)[/color]

[color=#93c47d]Body support:[/color]
CBBE - Supported
CBBE Bodyslide - Supported
7BUNP - Supported
UNP - Supported
UNPB - Supported
SevenBase - Supported [color=#ff00ff](NEW in v1.2!)[/color]

[color=#93c47d]Language support:[/color]
[img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/flags/uk.gif[/img] English - Full support
[img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/flags/ru.gif[/img] Russian - Full support
[img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/flags/br.gif[/img] Portuguese (Brazilian) - Full support [color=#ff00ff](NEW in v1.2!)[/color]

[color=#ffff00]Important notes
==================[/color]
1. Please ask any questions about installation of my esp's ONLY HERE in Posts section of this mod, not in the original mod page and not in pm.
2. Feel free to upload any screenshots here with this armors on your characters and followers (on screenshots please specify which body is used).
3. If you want to endorse this mod, then please don't forget go to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59399/?]original mod[/url] and endorse it too.

[color=#ffff00]Craft
==================[/color]
All armors are craftable in Ebony category in forge and requires the Ebony armors perk.
In the default esp of my mod all recipes of armors are visible and have the same requirements as in original mod. Armors are considered as heavy.

[color=#ffff00]Optional files
==================[/color]
Optional esp files are included in each archive in (OPTIONAL) folder. They are provided for each bodytype and for each translation.
There are 3 optional files:

[color=#93c47d]Light Armor:[/color]
All armors are considered as light. Crafted as default. All recipes are visible.

[color=#93c47d]Conversive Craft - Heavy Armor:[/color]
Alternative crafting method for people, who want more complex and various craft, and less cluttered forge interface. All armors crafted as conversions from one base variant. White armor is used as base variant. This was a purpose for what i have created the white texture - to look as uncolored armor. The recipes of other recolors [b]become visible when white armor is present in players inventory[/b]. White armor is crafted from the same materials as in original. Other colored armors are crafted from white armor + some various ingredients which are used to color the armor. Armors are considered as heavy.

[color=#93c47d]Conversive Craft - Light Armor:[/color]
Same craft method as above but all armors are considered as light.

[color=#ffff00]Installation
==================[/color]
1. Go to the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59399/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D59399&pUp=1]original mod page[/url], download and install only one main file "Crimson Twilight Armor - CBBE" (or another one main file depending from body you are using). [color=#ff0000]WARNING: Only main mod file is required. Do not overwrite it with any retextures located in original mod page!
[/color]2. Download "Crimson Twilight - TEXTURES PACK", extract and copy Data folder from this archive to your game folder with overwrite [color=#ff00ff](NEW in v1.2!)[/color]
3. Download only one main file "Crimson Twilight - All Retextures Craftable - /your_body/ (your_language)", extract and copy Data folder from this archive to your game folder with overwrite
4. [Optional] Copy in your Data folder one of the optional esp's if you want (optional files are located in (OPTIONAL) folder in archive)
5. Open the Skyrim launcher and check the "CrimsonTwilightArmor.esp" in the Data Files section (If you have installed optional file for light armor then you must check "CrimsonTwilightArmor-Light.esp" (or you can enable both, if you want the light and heavy armors craftable at the same time - they can be combined))

[color=#ffff00]Uninstallation
==================[/color]
1. Open the Skyrim launcher and uncheck "CrimsonTwilightArmor.esp"
2. Delete "CrimsonTwilightArmor.esp" form Data folder ("CrimsonTwilightArmor-Light.esp" if you are using light armor version)
3. Delete "crimsontwilight" folder from "Data\meshes\armor\" folder
4. Delete "crimsontwilight" folder from "Data\textures\armor\" folder

[color=#ffff00]Credits and Thanks
==================[/color]
[color=#93c47d]First of all thanks to the author of the original armor:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2509011/?]jmenaru[/url]

[color=#93c47d]Thanks to authors of retextures:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2509011/?]jmenaru[/url] (original Red and Black textures)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/15652154/?]Yngol1Storm1Blade[/url] (Blue textures)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1792897/?]cald123[/url] (Green, Purple and Woodland textures)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3110694/?]cinek12345[/url] (Yellow textures)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1330055/?]betterbecause[/url] ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60389/?]Al-Dahna texture[/url])
White textures and texture for black gauntlet is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7925943/?]my[/url] own

[color=#93c47d]Thanks to authors of conversions to various bodies:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759/?]ousnius[/url] (CBBE and Bodyslide)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7717124/?]AlpineYJ[/url] (7bUNP)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5134496/?]Shockero[/url] (7B)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2689072/?]zzjay[/url] and Halofarm (UNP)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/12014663/?]Robton[/url] (UNPB)

[color=#93c47d]Thanks to author of portuguese translation:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4619643/?]metal33br[/url]

[color=#93c47d]Thanks to author of fix for first person view:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10153162/?]CyborgArmGun[/url]

[color=#ffff00]Tools Used
==================[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url]
Adobe Photoshop CS2
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40638/?]Mesh tool N4 - PathExtractor[/url]
[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]NifSkope[/url]
[url=http://notepad-plus-plus.org/]Notepad++[/url]

files.name: Crimson Twilight - All Retextures Craftable - CBBE (ENGLISH)
files.fileName: Crimson Twilight - All Retextures Craftable - CBBE (ENGLISH)-60211-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
* Repacked CBBE packages - from this version optional files are included in each main package for each body. This is done for easy installation, because large variety of optional files can confuse an user.
* Added support for 7BUNP conversion.
* Added support for UNP conversion.
* Added support for UNPB conversion.
* Added portuguese translation by metal33br (CBBE only, no optional files).

files.name: Crimson Twilight - TEXTURES PACK
files.fileName: Crimson Twilight - TEXTURES PACK-60211-1-2.rar
files.changelogHtml:
* Added support for SevenBase conversion.
* Added Al-Dahna retexture by betterbecause.
* Portuguese translation extended to all bodies and to all optional files of each body.
* Coats and gloves enabled for khajiit and argonian races and now are visible on them.
* Boots in light armor versions now have light steps sound.
* Installation procedure changed - now textures are separated from esp's and provided in separate package.
